pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==================Core Exporters App==================Exporters for the curator core project.Quick start===========1. Add "core_exporters_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting----------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'core_exporters_app', ]2. Include the core_exporters_app URLconf in your project urls.py-----------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^exporter/', include("core_exporters_app.urls")),
